title: HELP i need to id this font
content:
[http://www.nickgrygiel.com/dump/breathe\_right.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320033345/http:/www.nickgrygiel.com/dump/breathe_right.png "http://www.nickgrygiel.com/dump/breathe\_right.png")

 [‹ E.W. Hornung bookcover serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320033345/http:/typophile.com/node/43289 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Typophile headline type - FF Unit Rounded {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320033345/http:/typophile.com/node/43285 "Go to next forum topic")
author: enndee1

comments.content:
These are often drawn specifically for the brand packaging. Here are some ideas for alternatives.

[P22 Pooper](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320033345/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/ihof/p22_pooper_black/?sample_text=Breathe%20Right%20&sample_size=74)  
 [Sarah Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320033345/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/borges_lettering/sarah_script_regular/?sample_text=Breathe%20Right&sample_size=74)  
 [FF Tartine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320033345/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_tartine_script_ot/)  
 [Soft Scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320033345/http:/www.fontshop.com/features/newsletters/sep2006_a/)

thanks alot Stephen, but i need an exact match, we have this pitch at 9am tommorow and unfortunatly the logo wasnt supplied to us. If anyone has any ideas id really appreciate, Obviously I can redraw it, but I really dont have the time now. This is one of like 10 things i have to put together for tommorow. AHGG.

it looks like its a mod. of pooper. whether i download it or not im still gonna have to do some work to it. Looks like its time to vector. Thanks again.

ND
